_comments._description: Configuration file for the Harjutame app. Customize dictation and math problem settings below.
_comments.prefer_sentences_with: Array of max 3 characters to filter sentences (e.g., ["a", "b"] will show only sentences containing these letters). Empty by default.
_comments.dictation_lines: How many lines to show in the Etteütlus block (default: 4)
_comments.math_problem_count: How many math problems to generate (default: 5)
_comments.maximum_sum: Maximum allowed sum for addition problems (default: 16)
_comments.addition_allowed: Set to true to allow addition problems (default: true)
_comments.subtraction_allowed: Set to true to allow subtraction problems (default: true)
_comments.multiplication_allowed: Set to true to allow multiplication problems (default: false)
_comments.division_allowed: Set to true to allow division problems (default: false)
_comments.comparison_allowed: Set to true to allow comparison (>, <, or =) problems (default: true)
